name: Partying Face
baseMeaning: A face wearing a party hat and blowing a party horn, with confetti around it.
tldr: Celebrating! Used for birthdays, achievements, good news, or any reason to party.

contextMeanings.meaning: Celebrating a birthday, holiday, or special occasion.
Celebrating an accomplishment or expressing excitement.
Celebrating team wins or project completions.
Sarcastically celebrating something minor or mundane.

platformNotes.note: Very popular for celebrating team achievements and milestones.
Used in birthday posts and celebration stories.
Common for announcing good news or achievements.

generationalNotes.note: Easily understood as a party or celebration.
